commands.title: n8n Health: Check instance health
commands.description: Check if n8n instance is reachable - returns 200 when healthy (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/monitoring/)

commands.title: n8n Health: Check readiness
commands.description: Check if n8n instance is ready to accept requests - useful for k8s readiness probes (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/monitoring/)

commands.title: n8n Health: Get Prometheus metrics
commands.description: Retrieve Prometheus-format metrics from n8n - includes workflow execution stats, API calls, etc (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/monitoring/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Test webhook (GET)
commands.description: Test n8n webhook with GET request - basic webhook connectivity test (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Test webhook (POST with JSON)
commands.description: Test n8n webhook with POST request and JSON payload - simulates webhook trigger (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Test webhook with custom headers
commands.description: Test webhook with custom headers - useful for testing authentication and header parsing (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Test webhook (form data)
commands.description: Test webhook with form data submission - simulates HTML form POST (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Test webhook with query parameters
commands.description: Test webhook with URL query parameters - verify parameter extraction (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Verbose test with headers
commands.description: Test webhook with verbose output showing request/response headers - useful for debugging (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/common-issues/)

commands.title: n8n Webhook: Test production webhook URL
commands.description: Test production webhook URL (different from test URL) - production webhooks stay active (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/workflow-development/)

commands.title: n8n OAuth2: Test OAuth2 callback endpoint
commands.description: Test OAuth2 callback endpoint - simulates OAuth2 provider callback (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-generic/)

commands.title: n8n OAuth2: Verify OAuth2 endpoint accessibility
commands.description: Check if OAuth2 callback endpoint is accessible - returns headers only (github.com/n8n-io/n8n/issues/10973)

commands.title: n8n Logs: View Docker container logs (real-time)
commands.description: Follow n8n Docker container logs in real-time - shows last 100 lines (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/logging/)

commands.title: n8n Logs: View logs with timestamp
commands.description: View n8n container logs with timestamps - useful for correlating events (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/logging/)

commands.title: n8n Logs: Search logs for errors
commands.description: Search n8n logs for error messages - quick error detection (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/logging/)

commands.title: n8n Logs: Search logs for webhook events
commands.description: Search n8n logs for webhook-related events - troubleshoot webhook issues (docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/common-issues/)

commands.title: n8n Logs: Export logs to file
commands.description: Export n8n logs to timestamped file - useful for sending logs to support (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/logging/)

commands.title: n8n Env: Check environment variables in container
commands.description: List all n8n environment variables in container - verify configuration (docs.n8n.io/hosting/configuration/environment-variables/)

commands.title: n8n Env: Check WEBHOOK_URL setting
commands.description: Verify WEBHOOK_URL environment variable - most common webhook issue (docs.n8n.io/hosting/configuration/environment-variables/endpoints/)

commands.title: n8n Env: Check database configuration
commands.description: View database environment variables - troubleshoot connection issues (docs.n8n.io/hosting/configuration/environment-variables/deployment/)

commands.title: n8n Env: Check encryption key is set
commands.description: Verify encryption key is configured - required for credential storage (docs.n8n.io/hosting/configuration/environment-variables/deployment/)

commands.title: n8n DB: Test PostgreSQL connection
commands.description: Test if PostgreSQL database is reachable from n8n container (community.n8n.io/t/how-to-migrate-from-sqlite-to-postgres/97414)

commands.title: n8n DB: Connect to PostgreSQL from container
commands.description: Open PostgreSQL shell from n8n container - verify database access (community.n8n.io/t/how-to-migrate-from-sqlite-to-postgres/97414)

commands.title: n8n DB: Check n8n database tables
commands.description: List all tables in n8n database - verify database schema (community.n8n.io/t/how-to-migrate-from-sqlite-to-postgres/97414)

commands.title: n8n Redis: Test Redis connection
commands.description: Test Redis connectivity from n8n container - should return PONG (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/queue-mode/)

commands.title: n8n Redis: Check queue length
commands.description: Check number of jobs waiting in Redis queue - diagnose queue processing (community.n8n.io/t/n8n-v1-95-2-docker-workers-not-processing-jobs-from-redis-queue-in-queue-mode/125680)

commands.title: n8n Redis: List all queue keys
commands.description: List all n8n queue-related keys in Redis - debug queue issues (github.com/n8n-io/n8n/issues/17395)

commands.title: n8n Redis: Monitor Redis in real-time
commands.description: Watch all Redis commands in real-time - see queue activity live (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/queue-mode/)

commands.title: n8n Network: Test external API connectivity
commands.description: Test if n8n container can reach external APIs - debug network/firewall issues (community.n8n.io/t/connection-refused-errors)

commands.title: n8n Network: Check DNS resolution
commands.description: Test DNS resolution from n8n container - verify hostname lookup works (community.n8n.io/t/connection-refused-errors)

commands.title: n8n Performance: Check container resource usage
commands.description: View CPU, memory, and network usage of n8n container - identify resource issues (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/)

commands.title: n8n Performance: Check container memory limit
commands.description: Check if container has memory limits set - debug out-of-memory issues (community.n8n.io/t/the-n8n-keeps-crashing-and-going-offline/43215)

commands.title: n8n Debug: Check file permissions in container
commands.description: Verify n8n data directory permissions - debug permission errors (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/docker/)

commands.title: n8n Debug: Test webhook from inside container
commands.description: Test webhook from inside container - isolate internal vs external connectivity issues (community.n8n.io/t/webhook-production-url-only-working-in-test/80228)

commands.title: n8n Debug: Generate diagnostic report
commands.body:
echo "=== n8n Diagnostic Report ==="
echo "Version: $(docker exec {{container-name}} n8n --version)"
echo "Environment:"
docker exec {{container-name}} env | grep N8N
echo "Health:"
curl -s {{n8n-url}}/healthz
echo "Container Stats:"
docker stats {{container-name}} --no-stream
commands.description: Generate comprehensive diagnostic report - collect key troubleshooting info (mathias.rocks/blog/2025-01-19-5-common-n8n-errors)
